name: LAUNDRY ROOM
description:
It's your first day on the job, cleaning gutters, sweeping floors, keeping the halls clean, it isn't graceful but it's the best you could get and they needed someone desperately. Just one more task before you can leave; some tenants are part of a free laundry service, those who can't do it themselves, just collect it from them and wash it in the basement. There's rumors of the last guy going missing down there, but they're just tall ales from a bunch of shut ins trynna mess with the new guy.

Description

Two small environments showing the sound of a planned horror demo, removed of mechanics and sequencing due to time restraints.

Gameplay

WASD - Movement

Move into the audio points to hear various sounds and be given a short explanation.

Known Issues

Audio may play multiple times, try to stay still in the center of the audio points.
